intro: Pterigium costatum, commonly known as the zigzag fern, is a unique plant belonging to the family Pteridaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive, undulating fronds that give it a zigzag appearance. The plant has a short, creeping rhizome with numerous branching roots. Its fronds are typically dark green and have a leathery texture. Pterigium costatum thrives in shaded, moist environments and is often found in tropical and subtropical regions.
